subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The next time Derek Jeter steps onto a baseball field, he will probably wear his Yankees cap, but on Sunday, he made his second, and likely final, rehabilitation appearance with Class AA Trenton.
snippet: The next time Derek Jeter steps onto a baseball field, he will probably wear his Yankees cap, but on Sunday, he made his second, and likely final, rehabilitation appearance with Class AA Trenton.
